alert.note: Alert for Washington (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 3:11PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central St. Tammany, southeastern Washington Parishes in southeastern Louisiana and southwestern Pearl River Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 311 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crossroads, or 7 miles southeast of Bogalusa, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Picayune, Sun and Bush. This includes Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 6 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
